Parameter.name: executeWorkflowScript
Parameter.description: The fully-qualified location of the program to run a workflow.

Parameter.name: secureForkPasswordFile
Parameter.description: The fully-qualified location of a file containing the password to use with sudo. The password is assumed to be the first line of the file.

Resource.name: mail/Session
Resource.description: Where the SMTP server for sending notification emails is located.

Parameter.name: xmpp.service
Parameter.description: Description of an XMPP service that Jabber notifications will be dispatched via.

Parameter.name: xmpp.user
Parameter.description: User name to use for XMPP notifications.

Parameter.name: xmpp.password
Parameter.description: Password to use for XMPP notifications.

Parameter.name: sms.service
Parameter.description: The SMS gateway. This is the default value.

Parameter.name: sms.user
Parameter.description: The account with the SMS gateway to send the messages by. This needs to have funds associated with it!
